name: Disc-O-Room
description:
[Note 2020-11-01]

I made some minor fixes on the game includes in-game control instructions. I hope you to play the new version(builds with '_Fix' suffix) but I left old version which is submitted before deadline for people who want it.

Thank you for playing and have a nice day!

[How to play]

Avoid and kill the discs, survive for as long as you can.

[Controls]

A or Left arrow - Move left

D or Right arrow - Move right

Spacebar - Jump

Hold 'move left' and 'move right' at same time - Shoot bullets(and start/restart the game)
